"Sound FX:
Tomás Cardenal
with the help of:
Alba Pereira"

"Graphics:
Grass Tiles by Alba Pereira
Box and metal tiles by OpenGameArt
Sci-Fi Gateway by Joseph Crown
Players and icon by Tomás Cardenal López

"Special thanks to:
Alba, Callejo, Julio and everyone who collaborated
in any way to the creation and testing
of this game"
We were unable to load the map
We were unable to succesfully save the map
Input the name of the map
There aren\'t any maps to load
The map %s has been loaded to be played
The computer wins! Turing test: Pass!
Options aren\'t available during the tutorial

"C_R_S_H is a game in which two little balls
(balls, with feelings) battle each other in a race to score points
and just beat each other up

In this tutorial we will show you
the different parts of the game
so that there's no chaos or confusion
(we DO love chaos or confusion, though)"
"This is the map, on the map you have different types of tiles\n the green ones are path tiles, you can walk on them"

"The other tiles can block you though
Brown boxes and red bricks will make you bounce
also, red bricks will reveal boxes

Gray steel tiles are just unbreakable"
"On the edges, you'll find indicators with information"

"On the upper edge, you've got life indicators
On the left, with a blue border,the player one indicator
On the right, player two, or COM's indicator
In this case, against a machine, it's gray
if it was against a human, it'd be red

The color will be the one of the player on the map"

"On the sides, attack indicators are found
If there's electricity, we will be angry and attacking
Otherwise, we will be on defending mode
Modes will toggle when players collide or the timer ends"

"On the lower edge, we have the timer
When the colored bar ends, the player modes toggle
When attacking, you can damage the opponent
If you're defending your opponent will hurt you!"
